channel.title: Comments on: Me 1
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: Hi there... It took me some time to figure out that 'send to email' is not my password, but it is not my fault that it was never sent to me. So now that I can comment I can tell you how pissed I am that there is not link to my site (http://homepages.nyu.edu/~ac1058/) under Friends and Family (btw, nice site Revital). Anyway congradulations! It's a cool site and it's great that you have something to do with 'gnobal' - I just hope you are not going to write too much about programming, since besides providing us with a profession, it sucks! OK I'll see you in two seconds on the MSN...
item.content:encoded:
Hi there…
It took me some time to figure out that ‘send to email’ is not my password, but it is not my fault that it was never sent to me. So now that I can comment I can tell you how pissed I am that there is not link to my site (http://homepages.nyu.edu/~ac1058/) under Friends and Family (btw, nice site Revital).
Anyway congradulations! It’s a cool site and it’s great that you have something to do with ‘gnobal’ – I just hope you are not going to write too much about programming, since besides providing us with a profession, it sucks!
OK I’ll see you in two seconds on the MSN…

item.title: By: joe shmoe
item.dc:creator: joe shmoe
item.description: amit this is very nice - i know your very talented but i didnt know you are playing drums.hope to read more what you are doing without the word motorola becouse its a secret... bye for now from your mad hatter,joe shmoe!!
item.content:encoded:
amit this is very nice – i know your very talented but i didnt know you are playing drums.hope to read more what you are doing without the word motorola becouse its a secret…
bye for now from your mad hatter,joe shmoe!!

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: Nice to meet you Amit, I read your stuff and hope you continue to write. You should read "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy", I'm shure you'll love it. Bye for now. Shaul.
item.content:encoded:
Nice to meet you Amit, I read your stuff and hope you continue to write. You should read “The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy”, I’m shure you’ll love it.
Bye for now.
Shaul.
